definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Saturn helps direct us back to becoming farmers in our own humble garden plot.
sentences.chinese: 土星直接幫助我們重新回到成爲農民自己的微薄園圃。

sentences.english: There is a garden ground falling into disuse .
My community garden in Manhattan’s East Village is no different.
sentences.chinese: 在曼哈頓的東村，我的社區園圃也是一樣。

sentences.english: Is There No Gardens in the Yellow Emperor Period?
What is a community garden plot?
Walk through the Bird Garden to the junction of Yuen Po Street and Flower Market Road.
sentences.chinese: 橫過雀鳥花園，前往園圃街和花墟道交界。

sentences.english: The record in ancient books on gardens in the Yellow Emperor Period is valuable and worth exploration.
sentences.chinese: 古籍中關於黃帝園圃的文字極爲可貴，值得探索。

definition: nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
to spin a web (spider)/to weave a net (e.g. for fishing)
to go on a hunting expedition
